mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article(title, tags, coverImg, summary, type, visibility, content) VALUES (#{title}, #{tags}, #{coverImg}, #{summary}, #{type}, #{visibility}, #{content})
INSERT INTO article(id, title, cover_image, summary, type, visibility, content, user_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{coverImg}, #{summary}, #{type}, #{visibility}, #{content}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO comment(id, article_id, content, user_id, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{detailsId}, #{comment}, #{userId}, #{status})
INSERT INTO article_likes(article_id, user_id, id) VALUES (#{detailsId}, #{userId}, #{id})
INSERT INTO article_stars(article_id, user_id, id) VALUES (#{detailsId}, #{userId}, #{id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM article_likes WHERE article_id = #{detailsId} AND user_id = #{userId}
DELETE FROM article_stars WHERE article_id = #{detailsId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.cover_image AS coverImg, a.summary, a.type, a.visibility, u.nick_name AS author, u.avatar, a.user_id AS authorId, a.view_count AS views, a.like_count AS likes, a.star_count AS stars, a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_time AS updateTime FROM article a join sys_user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE visibility = 1 OR (visibility = 2 AND user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{start}

SELECT a.title, a.summary, a.content, a.view_count, a.like_count AS likes, a.star_count AS stars, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime, u.nick_name AS author, u.avatar FROM article a join sys_user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article WHERE visibility = 1 OR (visibility = 2 AND user_id = #{userId})

SELECT c.id, c.content AS comment, DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, u.nick_name AS author, u.avatar, c.user_id AS authorId FROM comment c join sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.article_id = #{detailsId} AND c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.create_time ASC
SELECT content FROM comment WHERE article_id = #{detailsId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10
